documentation.title: Taimako & Takardu
documentation.subtitle: Nemo jagorori da albarkatu don taimaka muku samun mafi kyawun amfani da Contentry. Zaɓi jagora bisa ga aikinku.

whatsNew.title: Me ke faruwa
whatsNew.description: An gano sabuntawa ta atomatik da sabbin fasaloli da aka ƙara a dandamalin
whatsNew.subtitle: An gano canje-canje da sabuntawa ta atomatik a dandamalin
whatsNew.feature1: Canje-canjen UI da aka gano ta atomatik
whatsNew.feature2: Bayanin da aka samar ta hanyar AI

adminGuide.title: Jagorar Mai Gudanarwa
adminGuide.description: Cikakken jagora ga masu gudanar da dandamali. Koyi yadda ake sarrafa masu amfani, sa ido kan nazarin bayanai, da kuma saita saitunan tsarin.
adminGuide.feature2: Gudanar da Mai Amfani da Kasuwanci

enterpriseGuide.title: Jagorar Kasuwanci
enterpriseGuide.description: Jagora ga masu gudanar da kamfani. Koyi yadda ake gudanar da ƙungiyar ku, kafa tushen ilimi, da kuma kula da amincewa da abubuwan da ke ciki.
enterpriseGuide.feature3: Tsarin Aikin Amincewa da Abun Ciki

userGuide.title: Jagorar Mai Amfani
userGuide.description: Duk abin da kuke buƙata don ƙirƙira, nazari, da buga abun ciki. Ya dace da masu ƙirƙirar abun ciki da masu tallatawa.
userGuide.feature1: Samar da Abun Ciki & Kayan Aikin AI
userGuide.feature2: Binciken Abubuwan Ciki da Bin Ka'idoji

overview.intro: A matsayinka na mai gudanar da dandamali, kana da damar samun kayan aiki masu inganci don sa ido da kuma kula da dukkan dandamalin Contentry. Wannan jagorar zai taimaka maka fahimtar ƙwarewar gudanarwarka.
overview.dashboardDesc: Dashboard na Admin yana ba da damar ganin ayyukan dandamali da lafiya a cikin idon tsuntsu.
overview.feature1: Kula da ayyukan mai amfani a ainihin lokaci
overview.feature2: Nazarin abubuwan da ke cikin dandamali
overview.feature4: Samun dama cikin sauri zuwa ga mahimman ayyukan gudanarwa
overview.tip: Ziyarci Dashboard na Admin akai-akai don ci gaba da samun bayanai game da yanayin dandamali da kuma gano matsalolin da za su iya tasowa da wuri.

userManagement.intro: Gudanar da masu amfani babban aikin gudanarwa ne wanda ke ba ku damar kula da duk masu amfani da kamfanoni a kan dandamali.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Shiga sashen Gudanar da Mai Amfani don duba, bincika, da kuma sarrafa duk masu amfani da dandamali.
userManagement.feature1: Bincika kuma tace masu amfani da suna, imel, ko matsayi
userManagement.feature2: Duba cikakkun bayanan martaba na mai amfani da tarihin aiki
userManagement.feature3: Gyara matsayin mai amfani da izini
userManagement.feature4: Kashe ko share asusun mai amfani idan ya cancanta
userManagement.rolesDesc: Contentry yana da manyan ayyuka uku na masu amfani:
userManagement.role1: Admin: Cikakken damar shiga dandamali tare da damar daidaitawar tsarin
userManagement.role2: Admin Kasuwanci: Yana kula da ƙungiyar kamfaninsu da saitunansu
userManagement.role3: Mai amfani: Siffofin ƙirƙirar abun ciki da nazari na yau da kullun
userManagement.warning: Koyaushe a tabbatar da tasirin kafin a canza matsayin mai amfani ko a goge asusu. Waɗannan ayyukan na iya shafar ayyukan ƙungiyar.

analytics.intro: Nazarin bayanai yana ba da zurfin fahimta game da yadda ake amfani da dandamalin a duk kamfanoni da masu amfani.
analytics.metric1: Jimillar masu amfani masu aiki da yanayin ci gaba
analytics.metric2: Ƙirƙirar abun ciki da girman nazari
analytics.metric5: Biyayya da kuma ƙima a cikin kamfanoni
analytics.tip: Fitar da rahotannin nazari don gabatarwar masu ruwa da tsaki ta amfani da fasalin Rahoton Saukewa.

financials.intro: Sashen Bayani kan Kuɗi yana ba da damar fahimtar ma'aunin kuɗin shiga da biyan kuɗi na dandamali.
financials.revenueDesc: Kula da lafiyar kuɗi da yanayin biyan kuɗi a duk faɗin kamfanoni.
financials.feature3: Tarihin amfani da bashi da siyayya

systemConfig.intro: Tsarin tsarin yana ba ku damar sarrafa saitunan da haɗin kai na dandamali gaba ɗaya.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Saita da kuma sa ido kan haɗakar wasu kamfanoni:
systemConfig.integration1: API ɗin Ayrshare don wallafe-wallafen kafofin watsa labarun
systemConfig.integration2: Ayyukan AI don ƙirƙirar abun ciki da bincike
systemConfig.integration3: Tsarin biyan kuɗi ta hanyar Stripe
systemConfig.tip: Koyaushe gwada haɗakarwa a cikin yanayin gabatarwa kafin yin canje-canje ga saitunan samarwa.

gettingStarted.intro: Barka da zuwa Contentry! A matsayinka na Mai Gudanar da Kasuwanci, kana da kayan aikin da za ka iya sarrafa ƙungiyarka, kafa jagororin abun ciki, da kuma tabbatar da daidaiton alamar kasuwanci.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Bi waɗannan matakan don saita asusun kasuwancin ku:
gettingStarted.step1: Je zuwa Saituna > Kasuwanci don samun damar dashboard ɗin kamfanin ku
gettingStarted.step2: Loda jagororin da manufofin alamar kamfanin ku zuwa Tushen Ilimi
gettingStarted.step3: Gayyaci membobin ƙungiyar ku kuma ku ba su mukamai masu dacewa
gettingStarted.step4: Saita ayyukan aiki na amincewa don bitar abun ciki
gettingStarted.tip: Kammala tsarin Iliminka kafin ka gayyaci membobin ƙungiyar don tabbatar da cewa suna da damar shiga jagororin alama daga rana ta farko.

teamManagement.intro: Ingancin gudanar da ƙungiya yana tabbatar da haɗin gwiwa mai kyau da kuma ingantaccen ikon shiga cikin ƙungiyar ku.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Ƙara sabbin membobi zuwa ƙungiyar kasuwancin ku:
teamManagement.feature1: Shigar da adireshin imel na memba na ƙungiyar
teamManagement.feature2: Zaɓi matsayinsu (Mai ƙirƙira, Manaja, ko Admin)
teamManagement.feature3: Ƙara saƙon sirri na zaɓi zuwa ga gayyatar
teamManagement.rolesDesc: Sanya ayyuka bisa ga nauyin da ke kansu:
teamManagement.role1: Mai ƙirƙira: Zai iya ƙirƙira da ƙaddamar da abun ciki don amincewa
teamManagement.role2: Manaja: Zai iya amincewa/ƙin yarda da abun ciki da kuma sarrafa masu ƙirƙira
teamManagement.role3: Admin: Cikakken damar shiga kasuwanci gami da lissafin kuɗi da saituna
teamManagement.tip: Gayyata za ta ƙare bayan kwana 7. Tunatar da membobin ƙungiyar su karɓi gayyatarsu nan take.

knowledgeBase.intro: Tushen Ilimi shine babban wurin ajiyar bayanai na kamfanin ku don jagororin alama, manufofi, da ƙa'idodin abun ciki. Takardun da aka ɗora a nan suna ba da bayanai game da abubuwan da AI ta samar ga duk membobin ƙungiyar.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Ƙara takardu waɗanda zasu jagoranci ƙirƙirar abun ciki:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Jagororin salon alama da jagororin murya
knowledgeBase.docType3: Ka'idojin aika rubuce-rubuce a shafukan sada zumunta
knowledgeBase.tip: Da farko, loda mafi mahimmancin jagororin alamar ku. AI tana fifita takardu a cikin Tushen Ilimi na kamfanin fiye da lodawa na mutum ɗaya na mai amfani.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Tsarin aiki na amincewa yana tabbatar da cewa duk abubuwan da ke ciki sun cika ƙa'idodin kamfanin ku kafin a buga su.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Abubuwan da ke ciki suna gudana ta cikin waɗannan matakai:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Mai ƙirƙira yana samarwa ko kuma yana nazarin abun ciki
approvalWorkflow.step2: An ƙaddamar da abun ciki don amincewa (idan ana buƙata)
approvalWorkflow.step3: Sharhin Manaja kuma yana bayar da ra'ayoyi
approvalWorkflow.step4: Ana iya buga abubuwan da aka amince da su zuwa dandamalin sada zumunta
approvalWorkflow.warning: Kunna buƙatun amincewa a cikin Saituna don tabbatar da an sake duba duk abubuwan da ke ciki kafin bugawa.

billing.intro: Sarrafa biyan kuɗin kasuwancin ku kuma ku sa ido kan amfani da bashi.
billing.subscriptionDesc: Dashboard ɗin lissafin kuɗin ku yana bayar da:
billing.feature1: Cikakkun bayanai game da tsarin yanzu da kuma rabon bashi
billing.feature3: Tarihin lissafin kuɗi da hanyoyin biyan kuɗi

adminUsersPage.subtitle: Sarrafa masu amfani a faɗin dandamali

toasts.deleteSuccess: An goge mai amfani cikin nasara
toasts.updateSuccess: An sabunta mai amfani cikin nasara

adminUsersPage.deleteWarning: Ba za a iya gyara wannan aikin ba.

deleteModal.description: Wannan zai share mai amfani da duk bayanan da ke da alaƙa har abada:
deleteModal.irreversible: Ba za a iya gyara wannan aikin ba.

sections.analyzeContent: Yi nazarin abubuwan da ke ciki

gettingStarted.intro: Barka da zuwa Contentry! Wannan jagorar za ta taimaka maka ƙirƙirar abun ciki mai kayatarwa da bin ƙa'idodi ta amfani da kayan aikin da ke amfani da fasahar AI.
gettingStarted.step1: Saita bayanan martabarka tare da ingantattun bayanai
gettingStarted.step2: Haɗa asusun kafofin sada zumuntar ku
gettingStarted.step3: Ƙirƙiri Bayanin Dabaru don alamarka ko kamfen ɗinka
gettingStarted.tip: Fara da Tsarin Bayani na Dabaru don tabbatar da cewa duk abubuwan da ke cikinku suna kiyaye sautin da saƙonnin da suka dace.

contentCreation.intro: Samar da abun ciki ta hanyar amfani da fasahar AI ta Contentry yana taimaka maka ƙirƙirar rubuce-rubuce masu jan hankali cikin daƙiƙa kaɗan.
contentCreation.generateDesc: Ƙirƙiri abun ciki ta amfani da AI:
contentCreation.feature1: Shigar da wani batu ko umarni da ke bayyana abin da kake son sakawa a kai
contentCreation.feature2: Zaɓi dandamalin da kake son amfani da su (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, da sauransu)
contentCreation.feature3: Zaɓi sautin rubutu da kuka fi so
contentCreation.feature4: A zaɓi, a samar da hoto mai rakiya
contentCreation.schedulingDesc: Shirya kalandar abubuwan da ke cikinka:
contentCreation.schedule1: Saita jadawalin samar da abun ciki mai maimaitawa
contentCreation.schedule2: Zaɓi takamaiman kwanaki da lokutan don aikawa ta atomatik
contentCreation.schedule3: Kunna bugawa ta atomatik ko bita da hannu kafin bugawa
contentCreation.tip: Yi amfani da akwatin 'Promotional Content' lokacin ƙirƙirar rubuce-rubucen talla don tabbatar da cewa nazarin bin ƙa'idodi ya yi la'akari da jagororin talla.

analyzeContent.intro: Siffar Nazarin Abubuwan da ke ciki tana duba abubuwan da ke cikin shafinka don bin ƙa'idodi, fahimtar al'adu, da kuma daidaita alamar kasuwanci.
analyzeContent.step1: Je zuwa Daidaita Abubuwan Ciki > Yi nazarin Abubuwan Ciki
analyzeContent.step2: Manna abubuwan da ke cikin shafinka a cikin rubutun
analyzeContent.step4: Danna Nazarin don samun cikakken bayani
analyzeContent.type2: Hankali ga al'adu a yankuna daban-daban
analyzeContent.type4: Haɗarin da ke iya faruwa da shawarwari
analyzeContent.tip: Koyaushe a yi nazarin abubuwan da ke ciki kafin a buga su zuwa dandamali na waje, musamman don kamfen da ke niyya ga yankuna da yawa.

strategicProfiles.intro: Bayanan Dabaru suna bayyana mahallin, sautin, da kuma jagororin ƙirƙirar abun ciki da nazarinsa.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Bayyana masu sauraron bayanin martaba da manufarsa
strategicProfiles.feature2: Saita la'akari da al'adu da yankuna
strategicProfiles.feature3: Loda takardu da jagorori na musamman kan bayanin martaba
strategicProfiles.feature4: Saita sautin tsoho da zaɓin salo
strategicProfiles.tip: Ƙirƙiri Bayanan Dabaru daban-daban don kamfen daban-daban, samfuran samfura, ko kasuwannin yanki.

socialAccounts.intro: Haɗa asusun kafofin watsa labarun ku don buga abubuwan da ke ciki kai tsaye daga Contentry.
socialAccounts.connectDesc: Dandalin da aka tallafa sun haɗa da:
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Shafukan Keɓaɓɓu da na Kamfani
socialAccounts.warning: Kiyaye hanyoyin sadarwar asusunku na sada zumunta na zamani. Alamun da suka ƙare na iya hana wallafa rubuce-rubucen da aka tsara.

approvalProcess.intro: Idan kamfanin ku yana da ayyukan amincewa, dole ne a sake duba abubuwan da ke ciki kafin a buga su.
approvalProcess.step1: Ƙirƙiri ko yin nazarin abubuwan da ke cikinka
approvalProcess.step2: Danna 'Aika don Amincewa' don aikawa ga manajan ku
approvalProcess.step3: Bibiyar matsayin amincewa a cikin layin amincewa da ke jiran a yi
approvalProcess.tip: Ƙara bayanin kula yayin ƙaddamar da abun ciki don ba wa masu bita mahallin yanke shawara game da ƙirƙirar ku.

aboutGuide.title: Game da & Mafi kyawun Ayyuka
aboutGuide.description: Koyi abin da Contentry yake nufi kuma gano mafi kyawun hanyoyin inganta ƙirƙirar abun ciki, yarjejeniyar alama, da bayanan martaba na masu tasiri.

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry wani dandali ne na fasahar bayanai da ke amfani da fasahar AI wanda aka tsara don taimakawa masu ƙirƙirar abun ciki, masu tallatawa, da kamfanoni ƙirƙirar, yin nazari, da buga abubuwan da suka dace a sikelin. Ko kai mutum ne mai tasiri ko kuma ɓangare na babban ƙungiyar tallatawa, Contentry yana sauƙaƙa tsarin aikin abun cikinka.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Mun yi imani da ƙarfafa masu ƙirƙira da kayan aiki masu wayo waɗanda ke tabbatar da cewa kowane abun ciki yana kan alama, yana da alaƙa da al'adu, kuma yana bin ƙa'idodin dandamali.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Samar da abun ciki mai amfani da AI wanda ya dace da muryar alamar ku
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Binciken bin ƙa'idodi na ainihin lokaci don buƙatun ƙa'idoji
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Binciken fahimtar al'adu ga masu sauraro na duniya
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Tsarin aiki mai sauƙi na amincewa ga ƙungiyoyin kasuwanci
whatIsContentry.tip: Contentry yana haɗa ƙarfin AI tare da kulawar ɗan adam don isar da abubuwan da ke damun masu sauraron ku yayin da suke ci gaba da bin ƙa'idodi.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry yana ba da cikakken kayan aiki don sarrafa duk zagayowar rayuwar abubuwan da ke ciki:
keyFeatures.aiContentTitle: Ƙirƙirar Abun Ciki Mai Amfani da AI
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Samar da abun ciki mai inganci wanda aka tsara musamman ga alamar ku da masu sauraron ku:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Samar da abun ciki ta dandamali da yawa (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Sautunan rubutu na musamman (Ƙwararru, Na yau da kullun, Mai Wahayi)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: Samar da hotunan AI don rakiyar sakonninku
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Tabbatar da cewa abubuwan da ke cikinku sun cika dukkan buƙatu kafin a buga:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Tsarin bin diddigin bin ƙa'idodi ta atomatik na kamfanin
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Maki mai nuna fifiko ga al'adu ga masu sauraro na ƙasashen duniya
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Kimanta haɗari tare da shawarwarin da za a iya aiwatarwa
keyFeatures.tip: Yi amfani da Bayanan Dabaru don tabbatar da daidaiton muryar alama a duk abubuwan da aka samar.

bestPractices.intro: Bin waɗannan kyawawan halaye zai taimaka muku samun mafi kyawun Contentry da ƙirƙirar abun ciki wanda ke aiki da kyau:
bestPractices.workflowTitle: Kafa Tsarin Aiki na Abun Ciki
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Tsarin aiki mai dorewa yana tabbatar da inganci da inganci:
bestPractices.workflow1: Fara da kafa Bayanan Dabaru naka tare da jagororin alama
bestPractices.workflow2: Samar da abun ciki bisa la'akari da takamaiman dandamali da masu sauraro
bestPractices.workflow3: Koyaushe bincika abubuwan da ke ciki kafin a buga su zuwa dandamali na waje
bestPractices.workflow4: Yi amfani da fasalulluka na jadawalin aiki don kiyaye daidaiton jadawalin aiki
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Alamar kasuwanci mai ci gaba tana gina aminci da amincewa:
bestPractices.consistency1: Loda jagorar salon alamar ku zuwa Tushen Ilimi
bestPractices.consistency2: Yi amfani da Tsarin Bayani iri ɗaya don kamfen ɗin da suka shafi hakan
bestPractices.consistency3: Yi bitar abubuwan da AI ta samar don tabbatar da sun dace da muryarka
bestPractices.warning: Kullum a yi bitar abubuwan da aka samar da AI kafin a buga su. Duk da cewa AI ɗinmu yana da ƙarfi, kula da ɗan adam yana tabbatar da mafi kyawun sakamako.

optimizeContent.intro: Ƙirƙirar abun ciki mai kyau shine kawai farkon. Ga yadda ake ingantawa don samun mafi girman hulɗa:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Kowane dandamali yana da buƙatu na musamman da tsammanin masu sauraro:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Mayar da hankali kan fahimtar ƙwararru, amfani da kalmomin shiga na masana'antu, tsari mai tsawo da za a iya amincewa da shi
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Saƙonni a taƙaice, amfani da hashtags a dabarun zamani, shiga cikin batutuwa masu tasowa
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Abubuwan da ke cikin bidiyo suna aiki da kyau, suna ƙarfafa hulɗar al'umma
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Abubuwan da ke da inganci suna da mahimmanci, amfani da hashtags masu dacewa, Labarai don yin hulɗa
optimizeContent.engagement1: Rubuta rubutu akai-akai a lokutan da suka fi dacewa ga masu sauraron ku
optimizeContent.engagement2: Yi amfani da kira mai jan hankali don yin aiki a cikin abubuwan da kake so
optimizeContent.engagement3: Amsa ga tsokaci kuma ku yi hulɗa da al'ummarku
optimizeContent.engagement4: Bibiyar nazarin don fahimtar abin da abun ciki ke aiki mafi kyau
optimizeContent.tip: Yi amfani da fasalin tsara jadawalin Contentry don yin rubutu a lokutan da suka fi dacewa ba tare da ƙoƙarin hannu ba.

brandDeals.intro: Haɗin gwiwar kamfanoni na iya zama babbar hanyar samun kuɗi. Ga yadda za ku inganta hanyar ku:
brandDeals.preparationTitle: Shirya don Haɗin gwiwar Alamar Kasuwanci
brandDeals.preparationDesc: Ka kasance a shirye idan damammaki suka taso:
brandDeals.prep1: Kula da fayil ɗin abun ciki na ƙwararru, mai daidaito
brandDeals.prep2: Bibiya da kuma nuna ma'aunin hulɗarku
brandDeals.prep3: Gina kayan aikin watsa labarai tare da alƙaluman jama'a da kuma isa ga su
brandDeals.prep4: Yi amfani da Contentry don samar da samfuran ra'ayoyin abun ciki masu alama
brandDeals.pitch1: Daidaita ra'ayinka da dabi'un alamar da kuma masu sauraron da aka yi niyya
brandDeals.pitch2: Bayar da takamaiman ra'ayoyin abun ciki maimakon shawarwari na gabaɗaya
brandDeals.pitch3: Haɗa nazarin bin ƙa'idodi don nuna cewa abubuwan da ke cikinku sun cika jagororin
brandDeals.tip: Yi amfani da duba bin ƙa'idodin Contentry lokacin ƙirƙirar abun ciki mai tallafi don tabbatar da cewa an cika buƙatun bayyana FTC da dandamali.

influencerProfiles.intro: Bayanin Dabaru naka shine tushen dabarun abun ciki. Ga yadda ake inganta shi:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Bayanin martaba mai kyau yana tabbatar da daidaito, abun ciki akan alama:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Bayyana alkiblar ku kuma ku yi wa masu sauraro alama a sarari
influencerProfiles.setup2: Saita sautin rubutu da salon da kuka fi so
influencerProfiles.setup3: Ƙara la'akari da al'adu da yankuna ga masu sauraron ku
influencerProfiles.setup4: Loda takardun tunani waɗanda ke bayyana muryar alamar ku
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Ci gaba da inganta bayanin martabarku don samun sakamako mafi kyau:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Yi bitar abubuwan da aka samar sannan ka daidaita saitunan bayanin martaba kamar yadda ake buƙata
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Ƙirƙiri bayanan martaba da yawa don kamfen ko masu sauraro daban-daban
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Ci gaba da sabunta Tushen Ilimin ku tare da sabbin jagororin alama
influencerProfiles.tip: Yi bitar Bayanan Dabaru naka na kwata-kwata domin tabbatar da cewa yana nuna ci gaban alamarka da masu sauraronka.

workflowsGuide.title: Jagorar Gudanar da Aiki & Maki
workflowsGuide.description: Koyi yadda tsarin maki ke aiki kuma ku fahimci kowane matakin aiki daga nazarin abun ciki zuwa amincewa.
workflowsGuide.feature2: Yi nazarin Tsarin Ayyukan Abun Ciki

sections.analyzeContent: Yi nazarin abubuwan da ke ciki

scoring.intro: Tsarin maki a cikin Contetry yana ba da maki mai haske, bisa ga hukunci don taimaka muku fahimtar yadda abun cikinku ke aiki. Duk maki suna farawa daga 100 kuma ana cire maki don takamaiman keta ko matsalolin da aka samu.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Jimlar maki haɗin nauyi ne na dukkan abubuwan bincike, daga 0 zuwa 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Madalla - A shirye don bugawa, an inganta abubuwan da ke ciki sosai
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Nagari - An ba da shawarar ƙananan gyare-gyare kafin bugawa
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Yana Bukatar Kulawa - Ana buƙatar bita da gyare-gyare
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: An yiwa alama - Matsaloli masu mahimmanci, kar a buga su har sai an warware su
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Jimlar maki tana amfani da nauyin daidaitawa bisa ga matakin haɗari:
scoring.overallCalc4: Babban Haɗari (Biyayya ≤40): Jimillar maki da aka ƙayyade a matsakaicin maki 40
scoring.componentsDesc: Ana ƙididdige sakamakon ku gaba ɗaya daga manyan sassa uku ta amfani da tsarin bisa ga hukunci:
scoring.component1: Maki na Bin Dokoki: Ya fara daga 100, yana cire maki a kowane keta doka da aka samu
scoring.component2: Maki na Jin Daɗin Al'adu: Matsakaicin Girman Al'adu 6 na Hofstede
scoring.component3: Maki na Daidaito: Ya fara daga 100, yana cire maki a kowane rashin daidaito ko matsala da aka samu
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Kowane rubutu yana farawa da maki 100 na Bin Dokoki. Ana cire maki ga kowane keta doka:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Babban Keta Hakki (-60 maki): Keta Hakki na NDA, Bayyana Bayanan Sirri → Haɗarin Karewa Nan Take
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Babban Keta Hakki (maki -40): Cin zarafi, wariya, kalaman ƙiyayya → Haɗarin shari'a
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Babban Keta Hakki (maki -25): Rashin bayyana talla, keta doka → Tara/haɗarin dakatarwa
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Matsakaici Keta Hakki (maki -10): Sautin da bai dace ba, ƙaramin karkacewar jagora → Horarwa/gargaɗi
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Misali: #ad da ya ɓace (-25) + Matsalar Sauti (-10) = Maki na ƙarshe na 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Tarin laifuka da yawa - kowace hukunci ana amfani da ita gaba ɗaya
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: An duba keta haddi: Bayanin sirri, Cin zarafi, keta dokar NDA, Rashin bayyanawa, Keta doka, Sautin da bai dace ba
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Maki na al'adu shine matsakaicin ma'auni shida na al'adun Hofstede (kowanne 0-100):
scoring.culturalDim1: Nisa Mai Iko: Tsarin aiki, girmama hukuma idan aka kwatanta da daidaito, salon magana na yau da kullun
scoring.culturalDim2: Daidaito tsakanin mutane da kuma Tarawa: Mayar da hankali kan 'Ni/Ni' da kuma mayar da hankali kan 'Mu/Mu' a cikin al'umma
scoring.culturalDim3: Namiji da mace: Harshen gasa/tabbatarwa ko kuma na haɗin gwiwa/yarjejeniya
scoring.culturalDim4: Gujewa Rashin Tabbas: Dokoki, aminci, bayyanannen bayani da kuma buɗewa ga rashin tabbas
scoring.culturalDim5: Tsarin Dogon Lokaci: Mayar da hankali kan lada a nan gaba idan aka kwatanta da ribar ɗan gajeren lokaci
scoring.culturalDim6: Jin Daɗi vs. Ƙarfin hali: Kyakkyawan fata/jin daɗi vs. harshe mai tsari/mai sarrafawa
scoring.culturalCalc: Maki na Al'adu = (Jimillar maki 6 na girma) ÷ 6
scoring.culturalRisk: Idan maki na Al'adu ya faɗi ƙasa da 50, ana amfani da ma'aunin 'Haɗarin Suna' don kare alamar kasuwancin ku a duk faɗin duniya.
scoring.accuracyDetailTitle: Maki na Daidaito (Dangane da Hukuncin da aka Ci)
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Kowane rubutu yana farawa da Maki 100 na Daidaito. Ana cire maki idan aka samu matsala:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Babban Rashin Daidaito/Bayani Mai Ma'ana (-40 maki): Da'awar ƙarya, bayanan da aka ƙirƙira
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Tushen da Ba a Amince da Shi ba (maki -20): Iƙirari daga majiyoyi marasa inganci
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Da'awar da Ba Za a Iya Tabbatarwa Ba (maki -10): Bayanan da ba za a iya tantance gaskiya ba
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Misali: Da'awar ƙarya (-40) + Tushen da ba a tabbatar ba (-20) = Maki na ƙarshe na 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Tarin matsaloli da yawa - kowace hukunci ana amfani da ita gaba ɗaya
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Ana yiwa abun ciki alama ta atomatik bisa ga sakamakon bincike:
scoring.flag1: Kyakkyawan Rufewa (Kore): Maki sama da 80 - a shirye don bugawa
scoring.flag2: Yana Bukatar Kulawa (Rawaya): Maki 60-79 - an ba da shawarar ƙananan ci gaba
scoring.flag3: An yi wa alama don bita (Orange): Maki 40-59 - ana buƙatar bita kafin a buga
scoring.flag4: Matsaloli Masu Muhimmanci (Ja): Maki ƙasa da 40 - kar a buga har sai an warware su
scoring.disclosureDesc: Don abubuwan talla, tsarin yana kuma duba:
scoring.disclosure1: Tallace-tallace ne: Yana gano idan abun ciki talla ne ko kuma talla ne
scoring.disclosure2: Yana da Bayyanawa: Duba don bayyana #ad, #sponsored, ko haɗin gwiwa yadda ya kamata
scoring.disclosure3: Bin Dokokin Yanki: Tabbatar da buƙatun bayyana FTC (Amurka), EU, da Norway
scoring.disclosure4: Rashin bayyanawa yana haifar da babban keta doka (maki -25) akan Maki na Bin Dokoki
scoring.tip: Ana sake ƙididdige maki a duk lokacin da aka yi nazarin abubuwan da ke ciki. Yi amfani da fasalin Sake Rubutawa don inganta abun ciki mai ƙarancin maki ta atomatik yayin da kake riƙe saƙonka.

analyze.intro: Tsarin aiki na Nazarin Abubuwan da ke ciki yana taimaka muku kimanta abubuwan da ke akwai don bin ƙa'idodi, fahimtar al'adu, da inganci kafin bugawa.
analyze.stepsDesc: Bi waɗannan matakan don yin nazarin abubuwan da ke cikinku:
analyze.step1: Je zuwa shafin Bayanan Abun Ciki > Binciken Abubuwan Ciki
analyze.step2: Manna ko rubuta abubuwan da ke cikin shafinka a yankin rubutu
analyze.step3: Zaɓi Bayanin Dabaru don amfani da jagororin alamar ku
analyze.step4: Idan kana son AI ta ƙirƙiri hoto mai gani, zaɓi zaɓi 'Generate associating image'
analyze.step5: Danna 'Nazari' domin gudanar da cikakken bincike
analyze.type1: Duba Dokokin Aiki: Yana tabbatar da abun ciki bisa ga manufofi da ƙa'idodi na dandamali (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Sanin Al'adu: Duba abubuwan da za su iya ɓata rai ko kuma waɗanda ba su da wani tasiri a al'ada.
analyze.type3: Tabbatar da Daidaito: Yana tabbatar da daidaito da kuma daidaiton da'awa
analyze.type4: Daidaita Alamar Kasuwanci: Kwatanta abun ciki da jagororin Bayanan Dabaru naka
analyze.tip: Yi amfani da maɓallin 'Sake Rubutawa' don inganta abun ciki wanda maki ƙasa da 70 ta atomatik. AI zai magance matsalolin da aka yiwa alama yayin da yake riƙe saƙonka.

generate.intro: Tsarin samar da abun ciki yana amfani da AI don ƙirƙirar sabon abun ciki bisa ga taken ku, buƙatun dandamali, da jagororin alama.
generate.stepsTitle: Yadda Ake Samar da Abun Ciki
generate.step1: Je zuwa shafin Bayanan Abun Ciki > Samar da Abun Ciki
generate.step2: Shigar da batunka ko bayyana abin da kake son ƙirƙirawa
generate.step3: Zaɓi dandamalin da kake son amfani da shi da kuma sautin rubutu
generate.step4: Zaɓi Bayanin Dabaru don daidaiton alama
generate.step5: Danna 'Gina' don ƙirƙirar abun ciki mai amfani da fasahar AI
generate.optionsDesc: Keɓance abubuwan da ka ƙirƙira tare da waɗannan zaɓuɓɓuka:
generate.option1: Zaɓin Dandalin: Zaɓi dandamali ɗaya ko fiye (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Sautin Rubutu: Zaɓi daga Ƙwararru, Na Yau da Kullum, Mai Wahayi, ko Mai Ba da Bayani
generate.option3: Tsawon Abun Ciki: Daidaita tsawon abin da aka nufa don abun cikin ku
generate.option4: Samar da Hoto: Kunna don ƙirƙirar hoton da aka samar da AI tare
generate.tip: Ana yin nazarin abubuwan da aka samar ta atomatik bayan an ƙirƙira su. Yi bitar sakamakon kuma yi amfani da maɓallan ra'ayi don sake farfaɗowa idan ana buƙata.

schedulePrompt.intro: Jadawalin Umarni yana ba ku damar saita ƙirƙirar abun ciki ta atomatik wanda ke gudana a takamaiman lokutan, yana kiyaye kalandar abun cikin ku cike ba tare da sa hannun hannu ba.
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Ƙirƙiri buƙatun da ke samar da abun ciki ta atomatik:
schedulePrompt.step1: Ƙirƙiri tambayar samar da abun ciki tare da batu da abubuwan da kuka fi so
schedulePrompt.step2: Saita mitar jadawalin (na yau da kullun, na mako-mako, ko na takamaiman ranaku)
schedulePrompt.step3: Zaɓi lokacin da ya kamata a samar da abun ciki
schedulePrompt.step4: Kunna 'Nazari ta atomatik' don gudanar da bincike kan abubuwan da aka samar ta atomatik
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Kiyaye rubutu akai-akai ba tare da aikin hannu na yau da kullun ba
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Samar da abun ciki a lokacin lokutan kirkire-kirkire mafi kyau
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Gina bayanan abubuwan da ke ciki don bita da amincewa
schedulePrompt.tip: Umarnin da aka tsara suna samar da abun ciki zuwa daftarin aikinka. Yi bita kuma ka amince kafin bugawa don tabbatar da inganci.

schedulePost.intro: Jadawalin Post yana ba ku damar yin jerin gwano na abubuwan da aka amince da su don bugawa ta atomatik a lokutan da suka fi dacewa a cikin dandamalin kafofin watsa labarun da aka haɗa.
schedulePost.step1: Daga kowane ra'ayi na abun ciki, danna 'Jadawalin' maimakon 'Buga Yanzu'
schedulePost.step2: Zaɓi ranar da lokacin da kake son bugawa don bugawa
schedulePost.step3: Zaɓi waɗanne dandamalin zamantakewa da aka haɗa don bugawa zuwa
schedulePost.step4: Tabbatar kuma ƙara zuwa layin da aka tsara
schedulePost.option1: Lokaci na Musamman: Zaɓi ainihin rana da lokaci don bugawa
schedulePost.option2: Mafi kyawun Lokaci: Bari AI ta ba da shawarar mafi kyawun lokutan aikawa bisa ga bayanan hulɗa
schedulePost.option3: Multi-Platform: Shirya abun ciki iri ɗaya a kan dandamali da yawa a lokaci guda
schedulePost.warning: Sakonni da aka tsara suna buƙatar aƙalla asusun kafofin sada zumunta guda ɗaya da aka haɗa. Haɗa asusu a Saituna > Bayanan Yanar Gizo.

approval.intro: Tsarin Aiki na Amincewa yana tabbatar da ingancin abun ciki ta hanyar buƙatar sake duba manajoji kafin bugawa. Wannan yana da mahimmanci musamman ga ƙungiyoyin kasuwanci da masana'antu masu tsari.
approval.processDesc: Yadda abun ciki ke tafiya ta hanyar tsarin amincewa:
approval.step1: Mai ƙirƙira yana ƙaddamar da abun ciki ta danna 'Aika don Amincewa'
approval.step2: Abubuwan da ke ciki sun bayyana a cikin layin amincewa na manajan
approval.step3: Manaja yana duba abubuwan da ke ciki, maki, da sakamakon bincike
approval.step4: Manaja ya amince, ya nemi canje-canje, ko ya ƙi abubuwan da ke ciki
approval.status1: Daftari: Ana aiki a kan abun ciki, ba a gabatar da shi ba tukuna
approval.status2: Ana Jiran Amincewa: An gabatar kuma ana jiran sake duba manaja
approval.status3: An Amince: A shirye don bugawa ko tsara lokaci
approval.status4: Bukatun Gyara: Manaja ya nemi canje-canje - duba ra'ayoyin kuma sake aikawa
approval.tip: Ƙara bayanin kula yayin aika abun ciki don bai wa masu bita mahallin yanke shawara game da ƙirƙirar ku. Wannan yana hanzarta tsarin amincewa.

gdpr.cookieDescription: Muna amfani da kukis don haɓaka ƙwarewar bincikenku, hidimar abubuwan da aka keɓance, da kuma nazarin zirga-zirgar mu. Ta danna "Accept All", kuna yarda da amfani da kukis ɗinmu. Kuna iya keɓance abubuwan da kuka fi so ko ƙin kukis ɗin da ba su da mahimmanci.
gdpr.customizePreferences: Keɓance abubuwan da aka fi so
gdpr.cookiePreferences: Abubuwan da ake so a cikin Kukis
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Ana buƙatar tabbatarwa, tsaro, da kuma ayyuka na asali. Ba za a iya kashe shi ba.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Taimaka mana mu fahimci yadda baƙi ke hulɗa da dandalinmu don inganta ayyukanmu.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Ana amfani da shi don isar da tallace-tallace na musamman da kuma auna tasirin kamfen.
